result.reason: By-design behavior confirmed by maintainer kmscode — RDP panel doesn't auto-resize on window resize; SmartSize and Reconnect options already exist for this purpose
result.approach: No fix needed — existing SmartSize/Reconnect modes already address this. Changing default would be a breaking behavior change.
